items.title: LG rolls out new AI services to help consumers with daily tasks
items.description: LG kicked off the AI bandwagon today with a new set of AI services to help consumers in their daily tasks at home, in the car and in the office.

items.title: Qualcomm unveils AI chips for PCs, cars, smart homes and enterprises
items.description: Qualcomm unveiled AI technologies and collaborations for PCs, cars, smart homes and enterprises at CES 2025. At the big tech trade show in Las Vegas, ...

items.title: Xthings unveils Ulticam home security cameras powered by edge AI
items.description: The Ulticam security camera brand has a new model out today: the Ulticam IQ Floodlight, an edge AI-powered home security camera.

items.title: Intel unveils new Core Ultra processors with 2X to 3X performance on AI apps
items.description: Intel unveiled new Intel Core Ultra 9 processors today at CES 2025 with as much as two or three times the edge performance on AI apps.

items.title: L’Oreal Cell BioPrint analyzes your skin in five minutes
items.description: L’Oréal Groupe announced at CES 2025 the L’Oréal Cell BioPrint, a hardware device that provides customized skin analysis in just five minutes.
